low_cred: Be careful you Credibility is too low
rule1: •You can only add up to 5 new bin locations per day. This ensures high quality contributions.
rule2_pt1: •Only add bins you can currently see in person. Do not speculate on distant/unknown locations.
rule2_pt2: •Make sure to provide an accurate address or directions. Locations must be verifiable.
rule3: •Help the community by reporting on locations added by others. Your reports determine validity.
rule4: •If a location receives 3 "not found" reports, it will be removed from the map.
rule5: •The user who added an invalidated location loses credibility, except if it previously had 3 "found" reports indicating it was legitimate at some point.
rule6: •You can only submit location reports for bins near your current reported location for accuracy.
